name: Dungeon Roll (Vramir, broncebat, manik96, FuryAdcom)
description:
Dice-based survival dungeon crawler where the dice chooses what powers you can use. Try to survive as many rooms as you can while your cursed dice decides what challenges awaits you.

Through your journey you will find 3 types of doors: normal, challenge and reward. Challenge doors will give you a though battle but then you will be able to roll a dice on a reward door where you will find a permanent buff.

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • Left click to use the powers
  • F to interact with doors
  • ESC / P to pause the game

Credits/Assets used:

Tilemap and enemies made by Aleksandr Makarov

Menu background made by aamatniekss

SFX and Musc from Ultimate SFX & Music Bundle - Everything Bundle by Sidearm Studios
